articles.author: Abhishek Jha
articles.title: World population data: Average Indian 10 years younger than Chinese - Hindustan Times
articles.description: A comparison of the south Asian region shows that India’s median age is significantly lower than that of Sri Lanka (32.99 years). | Latest News India
articles.content: The median age of Indias population is 28.2 years, data from the World Population Prospects (WPP), which forms the basis of the UNFPA report released on Wednesday, shows. This makes the average India… [+1912 chars]
